task.title: Submit Time and Calculate Payroll
task.shortdesc: Submit imported time to the payroll batch tables and calculate payroll.

context.p: The gross-to-net amounts are calculated for all checks in the payroll batch tables. The Submit Time and Calculate step automatically generates the following standard reports:

row.entry: Provides an audit of the current payroll with potential issues to employee payments. Review for any inconsistencies before printing checks. If the report is blank, there are no import exceptions.
Provides information that can be used to verify that the payroll data was correctly entered or imported for the current pay period.

Provides a detailed list of each employee pay information. Use this report to find data errors after finalizing payroll, but before posting information to the history tables. The report provides employee information not included in the payroll edit listings but does not provide employer information. Review the Pre-Check Summary Liability Listing report to view employer information.

context.p: Review these reports from the completed tab of the Standard Reports page (Menu > Administration > Reporting > Standard Reports > Completed).

step.cmd: From the Payroll Overview page, select Submit Time and Calculate Payroll. The payroll calculates each pay check's gross-to-net amounts.
From the Available page, review the generated reports.
As you make updates to employee payroll data, you can select Calculate payroll as many times as necessary.
